verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Low in the grave he lay—- Jesus my Savior! Waiting the coming day—- Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Up from the grave he arose, With a mighty triumph o'er His foes; He arose a victor from the dark domain, And He lives for ever with His saints to reign. He arose! He arose! Hallelujah! Christ arose!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Vainly they watch his bed—- Jesus my Savior! Vainly they seal the dead—- Jesus my Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Death cannot keep his prey—- Jesus my Savior! He tore the bars away—- Jesus my Lord!
